See also: autobahn

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Auto +‎ Bahn

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [ˈʔaʊ̯toˌbaːn]
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Autobahn f (genitive Autobahn, plural Autobahnen)

  1. A class of road built to freeway standards, similar to a motorway.

Declension[edit]

Declension of Autobahn

genitiveeinerderAutobahnderAutobahnen
dativeeinerderAutobahndenAutobahnen
accusativeeinedieAutobahndieAutobahnen

Derived terms[edit]

  • Autobahnknoten
  • Autobahnraststätte

Descendants[edit]

  • English: autobahn
  • Persian: اتوبان‎ (Otubân, “freeway”)
